localised_description: Though not truly Undead, Crypt Ghouls unconsciously feel the Dark Magic that surrounds the most powerful Undead lords and are drawn inexorably towards it. Incantations bring out latent power.

Dire Wolves are the hunting hounds of the Vampires and their senses are as keen as they were in life. With a body as long as a grown man, Fell Bats are a fearsome sight. Foul magic only makes these creatures stronger.
Although their bodies have decayed, leaving only bones and tattered flesh, a Grave Guard is held together by evil magic so strong that it has endured for centuries.
Within the material world, these spirits are amongst the most dreaded of all Undead. Lacking physical forms altogether, they cannot be put down by axe, sword or hammer.

Vargheists are the darkness in a Vampire's soul made manifest. Terrorgheist are the largest and most ferocious bat species to have ever existed. Crackling with eldritch power, these beasts are now even more ferocious.
Rising up from the dusty dunes, rank upon rank of these Skeleton Warriors stand ready to kill once more in the name of their immortal monarchs.
Although not as numerous as Settra's grand army, Arkhan's Undead legions are bolstered by the Liche King's unparalleled necromantic dexterity.
The first and most loyal of the Great Necromancer's followers will stand at his side once again. So it is writtenâ€¦
The dead do not sit idly by in Nehekhara...
Clouds of deathly magic swirl around Arkhan.
No creature is safe from the destructive power that Arkhan wields.....
